name: Mech@mor Showdown
description:
The Kyriarch of Yendor must fall.
One of his mechas has been stolen by the Rebellion.
It is yours to pilot.
You are the Rebellion's last hope... ASCII Mecha roguelike.

Pilot a giant mecha. Swap out cool parts for cooler parts. Attacks and abilities are indirect: your mecha decides what to do depending on your orders, its personality, and your mutual trust.

Taunt your rivals.

All of your rivals are really hot.

Flirt with your lovers.

All of your lovers are really hot.

Save Planet Yendor from the Kyriarch.

Six missions. Twelve mecha types. Proc-gen. Permadeath.

This is a pre-release.

This is a feature-complete beta. It might still be buggy. Future releases will include bug fixes, more dialogue, AI improvements, music, and sound effects.
